about.name: Real Estate Landing Page
about.desc: Personal landing page for a real estate client Shreaz Ali to educate users about the benefits of home flipping and showcase his experience and achievements.

projectTeam.desc: This landing page project consisted of a product designer and a UX researcher, and took around  1 weeks to design.

desc: Client wanted to build a Landing Page for his home flipping real-estate business to help people know about home flipping and how his services can help them.
The Landing Page should not sound aggressively salesy as users are likely to avoid engaging with such websites.

goals.title: User Goal
goals.desc: Design the landing page showcasing the client’s achievements to establish trust and confidence among visitors.

goals.title: Business Goal
desc: Ensuring the design reflects the client’s personality casual yet experienced, showcasing their expertise and proven track record.
Highlighted the benefits of flipping homes through content that showcases the client's expertise, building trust with users.
Designed intuitive call-to-action buttons that guide users toward simple actions like signing up for a webinar or downloading a guide.
Implemented a clean, minimalistic design with a luxurious feel to reflect the client’s personality while ensuring smooth navigation.

targetAudience: Individuals aged  50 and above who are interested in real estate, financial growth, or learning about flipping homes.
discoveryPhase.uiInspiration: We analyzed multiple landing pages of websites in similar domain and Analyzed preferences of the target demographic focusing on a design and tone that resonates with their expectations.
discoveryPhase.ideaExploration: We created a wireframe for easy navigation and registration, then refined the hero and other sections based on client feedback to finalize the landing page layout.

ui.approach: A clean design using colors like yellow, black, and muted white, paired with professional typography using the Inter font, and high-quality images was chosen to create an ultra-luxurious and minimal look for the website.
ui.colors: We used a balanced combination of blue and green as primary colors for a medical look, complemented by neutral tones like white and sand. A subtle touch of orange stands out against the neutral tones and highlights the Call To Action Items.
ui.typography: The font “Satoshi” was used to ensure a professional look and easily readable experience.
ui.animations: Incorporated smooth scroll-triggered animations and fade-ins, including a silhouette overlay in the hero section for dynamic interactions.

achievements: Successfully designed the client’s Landing Page showcasing client’s achievement and experience along with webinar details, highlights and benefits.
The final design reflects the client’s approachable yet professional personality, creating an engaging experience that encourages webinar registrations while building trust with users.
